#include<stdio.h>
#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
int outdegree[1000003];
//int indegree[1000003];
int main()
{
    int t;
    cin>>t;
    bool done=false;
    while(t--)
    {
        int n,m;
        cin>>n>>m;
        for(int i=1;i<=n;i++)
        {
  //          indegree[i]=n-i;
            outdegree[i]=i-1;
        }
        while(m--)
        {
            int u,v;
            cin>>u>>v;
    //        indegree[u]-=1;
            outdegree[u]+=1;
      //      indegree[v]+=1;
            outdegree[v]-=1;
        }
        for(int i=1;i<=n;i++)
        {
            if(/*indegree[i]==0 &&*/ outdegree[i]==n-1)
            {
                printf("2 %d\n",i);
                done=true;
                break;
            }
        }
        if(!done)
        {
            printf("1\n");
        }
        done=false;

    }
}
